member.summary: Show form with track info from main form

member.name: M:PlayTray.frmMain.SanitizeFilename(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sanitizes track info string for use as filename Removes invalid characters and truncates to specified length

member.name: T:PlayTray.LyricsService
member.summary: Service to fetch lyrics from MusixMatch API Free tier: 2000 calls/day, returns 30% of lyrics

member.name: M:PlayTray.LyricsService.GetLyrics(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Search for track and get lyrics Returns lyrics text or error message

member.name: M:PlayTray.LyricsService.SearchTrack(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Search for track and return track_id

member.name: M:PlayTray.LyricsService.GetLyricsByTrackId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get lyrics text by track_id

member.name: M:PlayTray.LyricsService.ParseTrackInfo(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Parse track name to extract artist and title Assumes format: "Artist - Track" or "Track"

member.name: T:PlayTray.LyricsResult
member.summary: Result object for lyrics fetch operation

member.name: M:PlayTray.SelectedTracksDocument.GetRelativeImagePath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts absolute image path to relative path for HTML HTML is in Playback folder, images are in Playback/Covers folder
